content: magic, If you want to serve, let's say in Paris, France, all you have to do is file the proper forms and address a letter to your CO. Sure we can serve wherever we want. content: You can work with your branch manager to get an assignment that you want. Sometimes it works, often it is based on need. I really wanted to go back to Fort Carson after OCS and OBC, but there were no slots at Carson. So I talked to my branch manager and took an assignment to 4ID at Fort Hood with the intention of deploying with them and then moving with them to Fort Carson. This is my last week at Fort Hood and I am heading back to Carson. It took two years but it worked out. As a new LT your branch manager is looking to fill vacancies in units preparing to deploy, so you may not have many options.
